episodes.title: Ep. 11 (audio only): The EXJW Interviews - Chris
episodes.description:
Send me a text (https://www.buzzsprout.com/twilio/text_messages/2514763/open_sms) 


I had a great time interviewing my friend Chris. We shared very similar upbringings in the Jehovah's Witness organization. Born and raised in it, an all-in mentality, moved up the ranks, and had numerous "privileges" (duties) while in.


Gradually things made him rethink his life in that organization, specifically a very huge bombshell that woke him up totally. Chris is fortunate to have had his spouse wake up as well. Chris does something different, and actually asks me a question, which in turn got me a little emotional. I hope that you enjoy this thought provoking episode!


Support the show (https://www.buzzsprout.com/2514763/support)

episodes.title: Ep. 10 (audio only): The EXJW Interviews - Jared
episodes.description:
Send me a text (https://www.buzzsprout.com/twilio/text_messages/2514763/open_sms) 


This is a very special episode for me. I have mentioned in various videos the Jehovah's Witness involvement and treatment of CSA victims. In this episode my very special guest, Jared sheds light on this sensitive subject. Like me, Jared was born and raised in the religion. After baptism Jared moved through the ranks, and eventually became an elder. Get an inside look into the Jehovah's Witnesses world of how they deal with CSA within their organization.


Jared also speaks about the religion's practice of shunning members, and the results that come from it. It's not all doom and gloom however. Jared gives great advice about life after leaving the organization, how to begin healing, and how to thrive in life. I truly hope you find value in this important episode.


***During the episode Jared mentions two books that he wrote. Here are the links here:


1) Burn The Scorecard:  https://a.co/d/6JsSLnp


2) Authentic Leadership - What Really Works: https://a.co/d/7ub1xzY

episodes.description:
Send me a text (https://www.buzzsprout.com/twilio/text_messages/2514763/open_sms) 


I was in the Jehovah's Witness organization for over 50 years. Throughout the years I have noticed a gradual shift in the teaching and printing habits of that organization. The result? A watered down, indoctrinated, brainwashed, non-reasoning, non-critical thinking simplified edition version of a Jehovah's Witness. Back in the day we were intelligent, could stand our ground, and we had honor! How in the world do you think we grew their shit so rapidly in the 80s and 90s? Their dumbing down their members could very well be the unraveling of that wicked cult. Let's talk about it!

Case and point: the governing body (slave owners) recently gave the Jehovah's Witness cult members permission to pursue higher education (college, university, trade school) without ridicule like they have done for DECADES! The day it dropped I KNEW what the blinded witnesses would spew: No, we could have went to college at any time that we wanted to. NOPE! Nice try you delusional cult member/slaves. episodes.title: Ep. 06: The EXJW Interviews: Selina (LGBTQIA+ Episode)
episodes.description:
Send me a text
Wow, this turned out to be a truly great episode! Earlier in the week I put out a call on social media that I wanted to find EXJW's that lived within the LGBTQIA+ community now. The first amazing individual to reach out to me was Selina.
Selina story moved me, in fact I had to fight back tears a couple of times as I listened. Selina explains growing up as a Jehovah's Witness, realizing her sexuality, enduring an abusive relationship, and navigating away from thoughts of suicide. What a brave, amazing, resilient woman! She now lives a wonderful, happy life. I hope that you find value in this episode. 
*If you need to talk to someone about suicide, mental health struggles, emotional distress, alcohol or drug use concerns, or just need someone to talk to please CALL or TEXT 988 to talk to someone at the suicide and crisis lifeline, available 24 hours*

episodes.title: Ep. 05: The EXJW Interviews: Delores
episodes.description:
Send me a text
Hello EXJW Fam! Meet Delores. She and I met on one of my social media accounts, and she is also a member of my private EXJW group on Facebook. She has been out of the Jehovah's Witness cult for 22 years now. She expressed interest in sharing her story on my podcast. She told me that this would be the FIRST time that she openly talked about everything. I feel honored to share your powerful story Delores!
 
This is one of my longest interviews so far. There was a lot to unpack. Not only has Delores been out a long time, she still is going through deconstruction after leaving the Jehovah's Witness cult, BUT she talks about her sexual orientation while being in the cult, and how that was one of the things that made her realize that she could not be a Jehovah's Witness as an adult. Wonderful episode. I hope that you enjoy it as much as I did!
#excultmember #EXJW #exjehovahswitness #exjehovahswitnesssupport #jw #jehovahswitnesscult #jehovahswitness #jworg #mentalhealth #sexualorientation #sexuality #lesbian

episodes.title: Ep. 10: Questions from Listeners: #2
episodes.description:
Send me a text (https://www.buzzsprout.com/twilio/text_messages/2514763/open_sms) 


I'm excited to bring you my second segment, called Questions from Listeners.


On this episode I answer:


Does having facial hair change how one worships?


What part of the Jehovah's Witness religion do I agree with, and are they any parts that you miss?


What is the process when being appointed ministerial servant, or elder? Do you think they are really appointed by Holy Spirit, considering CSA cases like those in Pennsylvania?


Women in the organization are counseled on lots of things, take make-up, and how you dress for instance. What are Jehovah's Witness men counseled on about things they do or say, or what they wear?


How many people do you really think are actively in the JW religion?


What do you think was the real reason for the "new light" about toasting/clinking glasses?


How long have you cursed? Did you just start after you walked away from that religion?


I hope you enjoy this as much as I did!


#EXJW #ex-JehovahsWitness #JW #jworg


Support the show (https://www.buzzsprout.com/2514763/support)

I didn't necessarily feel that way, and in this episode will share a little insight as to how it was that I grew up being a witness kid, and elder's son. #exjw #exjehovahswitness #jw #jworg #excultmember

episodes.title: Ep. 01: An Introduction to Mitch
episodes.description: In this episode, I introduce myself and give you insight into my life growing up as a Jehovah’s Witness. I also give you preliminary thoughts as to why I wanted to break away from that religion/cult.

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses - A Corrupt Organization
episodes.description:
Hello, my name is Mitch, and I was in the religious cult known as Jehovah's Witnesses for over 50 years. I decided to break ties with them all together in January 2025. Although it may hurt family and friends still in that organization, I have to stay true to myself. My number ONE reason for leaving is the organization's choice to hide and protect accused sexual predators within their organization in congregations around the world, not alerting the proper authorities on who they are, or what they have done. Instead, victims are shamed and silenced.

I ask you to consider facts, and decide for yourself. My mission is to expose the false prophets at the world headquarters in New York, USA. The more people that are made aware of these horrible actions taking place, the sooner we can bring justice to the deserving victims. Thank you very much.
#exjw #exjehovahswitness #excult #exjwsupport #jw #jworg #jehovahwitness #jehovah #excultmember #jwglobal #jwgoverningbody #jwelders #jwcorruption #jwscandal

episodes.title: The Issues I Have with Jehovah’s Witnesses Elders - What Triggered Me to Leave Once and for All!
episodes.description: I always had questions about the organization. I have NO issue with God or Bible doctrine!!!! My beef is with the corrupt governing body and organization. I go by facts, especially court cases with real names, and real cover-ups exposed. Use your mind and see the REAL truth! #exjw  #exjwsupport #jw #exjehovahswitness #jworg #cult #jwbrotherhood #jwcult #excult #exjehovahswitnesssupport #jwelders #jwcoverups #jehovahwitness #jehovah
